statements: SELECT * FROM chatbot_interactions;
SELECT user_id, response, interaction_time FROM chatbot_interactions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT message FROM chatbot_interactions WHERE interaction_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_id, message, response FROM chatbot_interactions ORDER BY interaction_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(*) AS total_interactions FROM chatbot_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, message FROM chatbot_interactions WHERE response IS NULL
SELECT * FROM chatbot_interactions ORDER BY interaction_time ASC, user_id
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM chatbot_interactions WHERE interaction_time > '2022-01-01'
SELECT interaction_id, message, response FROM chatbot_interactions WHERE user_id = 2
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT user_id, message FROM UserInteractions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_id, timestamp FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM UserInteractions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT bot_id, AVG(confidence) AS average_confidence FROM Responses GROUP BY bot_id ORDER BY average_confidence DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Responses WHERE bot_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, message FROM UserInteractions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT r.interaction_id, r.response_message, r.confidence, u.message FROM Responses r JOIN UserInteractions u ON r.interaction_id = u.interaction_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Responses WHERE confidence > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_users
SELECT user_name, last_interaction FROM chatbot_users ORDER BY last_interaction DESC
SELECT message_text AS Message, time_sent AS Time FROM chatbot_messages WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT template_id, template_text FROM response_templates WHERE usage_count > 10
SELECT user_name FROM chatbot_users WHERE last_interaction BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT * FROM chatbot_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, last_interaction FROM chatbot_users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT message_text, time_sent FROM chatbot_messages WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY time_sent DESC;
SELECT template_text FROM response_templates WHERE usage_count > 10 ORDER BY template_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(message_id) AS total_messages FROM chatbot_messages GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_messages DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions
SELECT user_id, interaction_text FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC
SELECT response_text, response_timestamp FROM chatbot_responses WHERE response_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score FROM user_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score >= 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT response_id, performance_rating FROM chatbot_performance
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT interaction_text, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT response_text, response_timestamp FROM chatbot_responses WHERE response_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY response_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sentiment_score, sentiment_timestamp FROM user_sentiments WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY sentiment_timestamp ASC;
SELECT performance_rating, response_id FROM chatbot_performance WHERE performance_rating > 3 ORDER BY performance_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM ConversationHistory;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM ConversationHistory WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, theme FROM UserPreferences ORDER BY theme DESC;
SELECT feedback_type, feedback_description FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT suggestion_text, suggested_by_user_id FROM Suggestions WHERE suggestion_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, message FROM ConversationHistory WHERE chatbot_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM UserPreferences WHERE timezone = 'PST';
SELECT chatbot_id, response FROM ChatbotResponses WHERE response_id > 10 ORDER BY response_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, feedback_type, feedback_description FROM UserFeedback WHERE feedback_type = 'positive';
SELECT suggestion_text, suggested_by_user_id FROM Suggestions WHERE suggestion_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
